# isPrecise

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that proposes that the drop interaction define the drop location precisely, such as at a specific point within existing text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isPrecise: Bool { get set }
```

## Configuring a drop proposal

- **prefersFullSizePreview**: A Boolean value that indicates that the drag item preview should be shown at its full, original size.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates that the drag item preview should be shown at its full, original size.
items.name: prefersFullSizePreview
